title: Labirynt
creator_credit: Studio Miniatur Filmowych, Warszawie Przedstawia Film and Jan Lenica
brief_description: Jan Lenica’s diverse animation techniques in this film create a cruel and absurd world from which escape is impossible - anyone caught up in this Kafka-like nightmare can only persist, undeterred.
